title: "All we could do was scream for him": 25-year-old killed when Louisiana tornadoes pick up his truck and house - CBS News
content:
1. "All we could do was scream for him": 25-year-old killed when Louisiana tornadoes pick up his truck and house  CBS News
  2. New Orleans, surrounding areas, ravaged by tornado as severe weather moves into Deep South, 1 dead  Fox News
  3. Tornado Looks Electric As It Rips Up Exploding Power Lines  Inside Edition
  4. Deadly tornado reminiscent of 2017 tornado that passed over same area  WDSU New Orleans
  5. Girl survives a tornado that lifts her house and drops it into the middle of a street  NPR
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Connor Lambert, who used to play football for the local high school, was killed when his home lifted off its stilts and flew over his neighbor's house.
